jurisdiction.title: National Coalition for Core Arts Standards

05BBEC883E434BF398913739B2E729AE.description: HS Advanced: Critically investigate and strategically interact with legal, technological, systemic, and vocational contexts of media arts.

44A764029FFA4DD49841D3F9854D100A.description:
HS Advanced: Demonstrate the
relationships of
media arts ideas and
works to personal
and global contexts,
purposes, and values,
through relevant and
impactful media
artworks.

7D836981D672423EB2B493C7205B849E.description: HS Accomplished: Critically investigate and ethically interact with legal, technological, systemic, and vocational contexts of media arts, considering ethics, media literacy, digital identity, and artist/audience interactivity.

B232B3BA1C254E8CB95D6BD87A636296.description:
HS Accomplished: Examine in depth
and demonstrate the
relationships of
media arts ideas and
works to various
contexts, purposes,
and values, such as
markets, systems,
propaganda, and
truth.

49A86E546CC649D09A39E98307D38E3F.description: HS Proficient: Critically evaluate and effectively interact with legal, technological, systemic, and vocational contexts of media arts, considering ethics, media literacy, social media, virtual worlds, and digital identity.

8F1215BB8A3B4EF0BBBCFB1686A107C4.description:
HS Proficient: Demonstrate and
explain how media
artworks and ideas
relate to various
contexts, purposes,
and values, such as
social trends, power,
equality, and
personal/cultural
identity.

42F7779CB07F4FA4A670261751E3C9B0.description: Anchor Standard 11: Relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural, and historical context to deepen understanding.

41BEBD9129E54949ACE463942A709642.description: HS Advanced: Demonstrate and expound on the use of media artworks to consummate new meaning, knowledge, and impactful cultural experiences.

04CF8BC9C2BB448CB819F19A8B45D6E1.description:
HS Advanced: Independently and
proactively access
relevant and
qualitative resources
to inform the
creation of cogent
media artworks.

A07C2D755B3B4A4FA5B45D80F49607E3.description: HS Accomplished: Explain and demonstrate the use of media artworks to synthesize new meaning and knowledge, and reflect and form cultural experiences, such as new connections between themes and ideas, local and global networks, and personal influence.

4BEC0C79C5AB4B26B3ABDE23FB3ADD3E.description:
HS Accomplished: Synthesize internal
and external
resources to enhance
the creation of
persuasive media
artworks, such as
cultural connections,
introspection,
research, and
exemplary works.

290A5103A73148D49C3C29C65946F6E8.description: Explain and demonstrate the use of media artworks to expand meaning and knowledge, and create cultural experiences, such as learning and sharing through online environments.

9066F7125F78464B9263E41A34E25410.description:
HS Proficient: Access, evaluate,
and integrate
personal and
external resources to
inform the creation
of original media
artworks, such as
experiences,
interests, and
cultural experiences.Â

22D18AB0863D44DCA7752EE339073919.description: Anchor Standard 10:Â Synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make art.

8168864576604A35B7233DD7B212F07F.description:
HS Advanced:Â Independently

artworks and
production
processes,
considering complex
goals and factors.

B4877D7F71F1409987774B88EB4C29AF.description:

defensible

works and

3E1D24E22842490F99C26FCC04ACE507.description: Anchor Standard 9:Â Apply criteria to evaluate artistic work.

E5023D3CDABB449E9337B5C7739BDD0A.description:

of media artworks,

8FFD9EEDEA1947BF8BBE804FF40210AB.description:
HS Proficient:Â Analyze the intent,

of media artworks,

1DE67B9009A84D5B9424E957DA0A2305.description: Anchor Standard 8: Interpret intent and meaning in artistic work.

7EDBAD3C4C964107BEBD44EC544E58A3.description: HS Advanced: Survey an exemplary range of media artworks, analyzing methods for managing audience experience, creating intention and persuasion through multimodal perception, and systemic communications.

D422806D58C74353AFDC2B55455B7C83.description:

synthesize the
qualities and
relationships of the
components and
audience impact in a
variety media

728FA29410D04FE1A17326D245DA2BC1.description: HS Accomplished: Analyze how a broad range of media artworks manage audience experience, create intention and persuasion through multimodal perception.

BA2FC98F5459421B9718AB9A6469AAE0.description:
HS Accomplished: Analyze and
synthesize the
qualities and

components in a

feedback on how

154DB8D4FD5042AAA1672A516A7DA218.description: HS Proficient: Analyze how a variety of media artworks manage audience experience and create intention through multimodal perception.

A44F30A8CC694B46B291BD9948D5CF70.description:

2CD7285E3A4F46459A3DF1A18DEB0083.description: Anchor Standard 7:Â : Perceive and analyze artistic work.

F781F49A8F704E18826276BDEA44A97D.description: Â HS Advanced: Independently evaluate, compare, and integrate improvements in presenting media artworks, considering personal to global impacts, such as new understandings that were gained by artist and audience.

64950F7A13A4406BB0024202E10EB2F5.description:
HS Advanced: Curate, design, and
promote the
presentation and

intentional impacts,
through a variety of

markets and venues.

A9D8AF78E28341C8957AB474C31263F5.description: HS Accomplished: Evaluate and implement improvements in presenting media artworks, considering personal, local, and social impacts such as changes that occurred for people, or to a situation.

19886D16476C49EBB6B56038E475BBA6.description:
HS Accomplished: Curate and design
the presentation and

such as mass

physical and virtual
channels.

F83B73B8C1D44CCBA4C96E1F32C56DEC.description: HS Proficient: Evaluate and implement improvements in presenting media artworks, considering personal and local impacts, such as the benefits for self and others.

AB158C95A9A34B9BA9AD338F5E1141B2.description:
HS Proficient: Design the
presentation and

23D5C1C8F5A1478E9408EF54AF423709.description: Anchor Standard 6:Â Convey meaning through the presentation of artistic work.

C7718D1B126A4163B6929693A8AF3F91.description: HS Advanced: Independently utilize and adapt tools, styles, and systems in standard, innovative, and experimental ways in the production of complex media artworks.

780E9E1080964A54966AF8C396558E86.description: HS Advanced: Fluently employ mastered creative and innovative adaptability in formulating lines of inquiry and solutions, to address complex challenges within and through media arts productions.Â

A8D9F93114F84813B6E5730E1F3A3D2D.description:
HS Advanced: Employ mastered
artistic, design,
technical, and soft
skills in managing
and producing media
artworks.Â b. c.Â

E6AB1E0AC3604754B9D781DF6DB96B8D.description: HS Accomplished: Demonstrate the skillful adaptation and combination of tools, styles, techniques, and interactivity to achieve specific expressive goals in the production of a variety of media artworks.

F3EA8B04881D48AF960AA96DBA43AEBF.description: HS Accomplished: Demonstrate effective ability in creative and adaptive innovation abilities, such as resisting closure, and responsive use of failure, to address sophisticated challenges within and through media arts productions.

EC48FBE0D9A4446DA79B962044A11554.description:
HS Accomplished: Demonstrate
effective command
of artistic, design,
technical and soft
skills in managing
and producing media
artworks.Â b.Â  c.Â

F85B9515864241F7A7296CF715E0D3C6.description: HS Proficient: Demonstrate adaptation and innovation through the combination of tools, techniques and content, in standard and innovative ways, to communicate intent in the production of media artworks.

15610104D38F47D19D4CD382D1741D9E.description: HS Proficient: Develop and refine a determined range of creative and adaptive innovation abilities, such as design thinking, and risk taking, in addressing identified challenges and constraints within and through media arts productions.Â

743F6A16281D42AE8D2F7E9D5C2A0105.description:
HS Proficient: Demonstrate
progression in
artistic, design,
technical, and soft
skills, as a result of
selecting and
fulfilling specified
roles in the
production of a
variety of media
artworks.

BD44BF5F57B447D7AD6B9AA77775A654.description: Anchor Standard 5:Â Develop and refine artistic techniques and work for presentation.

03285038879845869540FFA4CE455757.description:
HS Advanced:Â Synthesize various
arts, media arts
forms and academic
content into unified
media arts
productions that
retain artistic fidelity

such as

productions.

3FFE0E92E59E42C3BA098DCDEFC2E464.description:
HS Accomplished:Â Integrate various
arts, media arts
forms, and academic
content into unified
media arts
productions that
retain thematic
integrity and stylistic

transmedia
productions.

5C70D243D3604CB5BFC32417755359B1.description:
HS Proficient:Â Integrate various
arts, media arts
forms, and content
into unified media
arts productions,
considering the
reaction and

172BBBF949E9459B9354C480DDA9658B.description: Anchor Standard 4:Â Select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for presentation.

1D3DA16B8D1B44349A7B1A6CED3EFFB7.description: HS Advanced: Intentionally and consistently refine and elaborate elements and components to form impactful expressions in media artworks, directed at specific purposes, audiences, and contexts.

3D67A1B36A7F44519A868BB6F43211EE.description:
HS Advanced: Synthesize
content, processes,
and components to
express compelling
purpose, story,
emotion, or ideas in
complex media arts
productions,
demonstrating
mastery of
associated principles,
such as hybridization.Â Â

805C1035F376432C9B4F8543ECDBC5DA.description: HS Accomplished: Refine and elaborate aesthetic elements and technical components to intentionally form impactful expressions in media artworks for specific purposes, intentions, audiences and contexts.

55BED23CBBAD4C978DCD47A9FEB802F1.description:
HS Accomplished: Consolidate
production processes
to demonstrate

organizing and

and stylistic
conventions in media
arts production,
demonstrating
understanding of
associated principles,
such as continuity
and juxtaposition.Â

7EE4BFE803A2482EA935CB2EC06DB457.description: HS Proficient: Refine and modify media artworks, honing aesthetic quality and intentionally accentuating stylistic elements, to reflect an understanding of personal goals and preferences.

8BBA1CAD5C2E4A5EA4B0939210138974.description:

production processes
to demonstrate

and stylistic

arts productions,
demonstrating
understanding of
associated principles,
such as emphasis and

production
